backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing debate management, agent registry with pre-populated agents (Skippy, GLaDOS, Robby, etc.), user profiles, file metadata storage, and access control using mixins for authorization and blob storage.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no features documented.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including components, hooks, configuration, and utilities for a debate/agent management application with speech recognition, file upload, and agent health monitoring.
frontend/.env: Local development environment configuration specifying backend canister ID and DFX network set to local.
frontend/.env.production: Production environment configuration specifying backend canister ID and DFX network set to IC mainnet.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color palette defining CSS variables for light and dark modes with neutral grayscale theme for technical infrastructure UI.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the application titled 'The Gang' with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component with three tabs (Boardroom, Sensory Cortex, Swarm Health), authentication handling, debate management with voice/text input, transcript download, and agent registry display.
frontend/src/components/AgentRegistryTab: Agent registry table displaying system vitals, agent status with toggle switches, memory usage progress bars, diagnostics modal, and reset agents button with toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/CrashLogModal.ts: Dialog modal component displaying agent diagnostics and telemetry information with monospace terminal-style styling in green/black theme.
frontend/src/components/DebateDisplay.ts: Displays the debate transcript in a card with speaker badges (Skippy, GLaDOS, Robby, SYSTEM), text-to-speech controls for each message, and auto-scrolling. Shows emergency mode indicator when active.
Provides a button to interrupt/stop an active debate by canceling speech synthesis and calling the backend abort mutation.
frontend/src/components/PushToTalkButton: Implements push-to-talk speech recognition with a button that toggles listening state and calls a callback with the transcript when recording stops.
frontend/src/components/SensoryCortexTab: Handles file uploads (drag-drop, manual, camera) by chunking large files and routing them to appropriate agents via the backend, with progress tracking and preview generation for text/images.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance with authentication, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context with login/logout functionality, identity management, and status tracking using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend operations including debate status polling, starting/aborting debates, document routing, and agent management (status toggling, reset).
Custom React hook that wraps the browser's Web Speech API for speech recognition, providing start/stop controls, transcript state, error handling, and browser support detection with functional state updates to prevent stale closures.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpeechSynthesis.ts: Custom React hook for text-to-speech using the browser's Speech Synthesis API, with voice selection logic prioritizing British male voices and providing speak/cancel controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useWakeWordStub.ts: Commented-out stub file with TODO note for future integration of Picovoice Porcupine wake word detection to trigger speech recognition automatically.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes using OKLCH color space, defining design tokens for colors, borders, and animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the root React component with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers for state management and authentication.
frontend/src/utils/transcriptParser.ts: Utility function that sanitizes transcript text by stripping HTML table tags and converting URLs and markdown-style links into clickable anchor elements.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom theme extensions including OKLCH color system, container settings, border radius variables, shadows, and animations with typography and container query plugins.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite build configuration for React app with environment variable injection, path aliases, canister ID definitions, and local development proxy for API requests.
project_state.json: Project state file defining three pending architectural requirements to update the useActor hook by adding useState import, creating telemetryActor state, and updating the return statement to include telemetryActor.
